metadata.title: Diversification matters
metadata.description: Diversification means "not putting all your eggs into one basket": if you invest in a single stock or one sector only, you risk great losses if that sector doesn't develop well

dialogs: Buy the stocks you think will develop best over the next 14 months
Surprisingly, Apple performed badly over this time frame. Some lucky investors gained a lot from Microsoft
A balanced investor might have achieved earnings of XX%, performing much better than those who only bough Apple stock
